Headline: Northbound #91 Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/Lake
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Corcoran, Ridgeland, Madison, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #91 buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Corcoran, Ridgeland, Madison, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
